Controls: Use these keys to move the character around the map
Use one of these keys to interact with characters, objects, minigames and dialogues
Use the mouse to interact with the clipboard and the minigames.
Interactions: Throughout the game you will find different things that you can interact with. As you approach, a white outline appears, highlighting and indicating the possibility of interaction.
This interaction can be a dialogue, a minigame, or part of the challenge for the current level. When you see a highlighted object, press one of the interaction keys to view the available action.
Clipboard: The clipboard is always with you. It serves as a detailed guide for all your tasks.
I'm always in the corner of your screen, to consult me ​​just call me hovering the mouse over me!

Tutorial: I always stay in the corner of your screen, to consult me just call me by hovering your mouse over me!

Level1: Welcome to soUni, talk to the chemical operator and collect the PPE's
Level2: Welcome to the PVC themed level! Go through all the platform challenges and open all the valves using the interaction button to release the PVC powder into the container and advance to the next stage. Don't forget to play the forklift mini-game at the end of the level.
Level3: Hello, welcome to level 3, with the theme of liquids. First, you will play a mini-game of acidic and basic solutions, with the identification of a pH strip, after which you will pass through obstacles to reach the end.

Use the wood inside the box to fill in the remaining spaces in the fixed wood, they must be aligned and at a predetermined distance and following the fitting pattern, as shown in the image above

questions.question: What are the PPEs used for liquid protection?
questions.tip: The last level of the game is about liquids.
answers: Helmet, boot, glove, ear protector, belt, and lab coat.
Mask with filter, helmet, safety goggles, glove, ear protector.
Mask with filter, escape mask, safety goggles, PVC hood with visor, glove, PVC clothing, and PVC boots.
Apron, thyroid protector, glove, skirt, glasses, cap, and other personal protective clothing.

questions.question: Why should the sacks be stacked aligned?
questions.tip: You stacked sacks in the Level 1 minigame.
answers: To facilitate transportation by the company and in trucks.
To organize the company's environment and prevent accidents due to sacks falling.
To preserve the integrity of the pallets.
All options are correct

questions.question: Knowing that the sacks are stacked on top of a pallet, why does the pallet need to be assembled correctly?
questions.tip: The first level's minigame is about pallets.
answers: The pallet needs to support weights, so a poorly designed pallet can cause accidents.
To use less material.
To replace the use of more expensive materials in bag stacking.
To look aesthetically pleasing.
questions.correctAnswer: The pallet needs to support weights, so a poorly designed pallet can cause accidents.

questions.question: What is the best course of action when sounding an alarm in a chemical industry?
questions.tip: Always maintain attention and focus on work, as any carelessness can cause accidents.
answers: Ignoring the alarm and continuing to work normally.
Immediately leaving the area affected by the alarm and following safety instructions.
Calling management and asking what to do.
Trying to disable the alarm without the help of a qualified professional
questions.correctAnswer: Immediately leaving the area affected by the alarm and following safety instructions.

questions.question: What is the most important safety measure when handling liquid soda in a chemical industry?
questions.tip: Always maintain focus and attention at work, as any carelessness can cause accidents.
answers: Using personal protective equipment such as safety glasses and rubber gloves.
Storing the liquid soda in plastic containers in a ventilated and dry location.
Mixing the liquid soda with other chemicals to increase its effectiveness.
Disposing of the liquid soda directly into the sewage system when it is no longer needed.
questions.correctAnswer: Using personal protective equipment such as safety glasses and rubber gloves.
